lines.text:
[singing]
My Star keeps me company and leads me through the night/My Star watches over me and fills my dreams with light/Some things change but some things shine forever as they are/In the sky, shining high, My Star.
You little bug-lover, I've told you and I've told you I don't want no strangers around here and look what you've done, you've brought them here and don't even know who they are. Who are you?
Good-bye not good.
Don't let me catch you giving none of them muffins to them little beggars outside, ya hear me?
[Deciding how to get across the moat]
Wicket swim.
Oh no you don't swim. Take a look at this.
[Sticks a stick into water and it's instantly eaten]
See that? That could've been you, ya little beggar.
Star Cruiser Crash Crash.
Mace? Mace!

[under fire]
Get back, Cindel!

[looks to the unconscious form of her mother lying next to Mace]
Mommy!
Run, Cindel! Get help! Get Dad!
[Cindel runs off to find their father]
[Mace looks at his bracelet, seeing his mother's life indicator blinking. He grips his blaster tightly and continues to fire]

[a laser blast explodes over his head]
Oooooff!
[realizing he is in a bad spot, Mace grabs his mother by the arms and drags her into a nearby hut. The mauraders target the hut Mace just entered, and fire, destroying it]

[Cindel sees and hears the explosion. She stops to look at the flame plume, then down to her bracelet. Both her mother's and Mace's life indicators go out; they have been killed. Cindel resumes running to find her father]

[after running from the maurader attack with Cindel, Jeremitt finds a hiding spot to rest. He has been hit in the shoulder by a laser blast]
Are you all right, sweetheart?
Mmm hmm. Mommy, Mace, they're dead.
I know. But we need to be strong now. You remember the song your mother sings to you about the little bird?

[nods]
Mmm hmm.
Well, I'm going to need you to be strong like that little bird. Now, I want you to run, and find Deej, and the Ewoks will help you.
No Daddy, I want to stay here with you!
Now listen to me. You will do as I say. Now, when I say go, you run. Run hard and fast, and don't look back.
[Jeremitt hugs his daughter tightly]
Cindel, I will always be with you! I love you!

[the mauraders are closing in on Jeremitt and Cindel's position. Jeremitt loudly whispers to Cindel... ]
Cindel, go! Run fast, just run, run!

[Jeremitt runs out of the hiding spot to draw the mauraders attention. He shoots one of them and runs in the opposite direction Cindel is, to get them to chase him instead of her. The mauraders give chase, shooting at Jeremitt, mortally wounding him. The last we see of Jeremitt is his arm trying to raise up from where he has fallen and then slumping over, dead]

[the mauraders have captured Jeremitt outside of his crashed star cruiser and are holding him prisoner. The leader, King Terak, approaches Jeremitt, roughly brings him to his feet and slams him against the side of the star cruiser]
You have the power? You will give it to me, now!
I don't have any power! My family and I, we're stangers here!
You will give me the power now!
I don't know what you're talking about!

[one of the mauraders has entered the star cruiser, pulled the power cell, and hands it to Terak]
Ah!
Oh, no! No, Please don't take that! Uhhh!
[Terak has backhanded Jeremitt with his forearm, knocking him back into the star cruiser, and down]

[Charal has brought Cindel before Terak. He reaches out to stroke her face]
Oh, what a cute little girl!
What have you done with the Ewoks?
The Ewoks?
My friends!
Oh, they are here as my... guests! My most honored guests!
You better not have hurt them!
Oh, I won't hurt them. Not
[he motions for one of his soldiers to bring him the power cell taken from Cindel's family's star cruiser, which he sets down in front of her]
if you make *this* work.
How?
Use your magic.
I don't know anthing about *magic*!
Make it work!
I can't!
Don't be foolish, do as he says.
I can't! I can't!
You don't want to incur his wrath!
But it doesn't do anything! It's just a piece of the star cruiser! You just have to plug it into something!
Exactly! The power wil allow me to cruise the stars! I will give you until dawn. If you have not done as I have commanded, you and your *friends* will be doomed!
[looks to Charal]
And you will suffer in her fate!
